subject: Religion & Spirituality
subcategory: Sacred Texts That Shaped the World
title: The Egyptian Book of the Dead: Instructions for the Afterlife
description: A fast breakdown of The Egyptian Book of the Dead: Instructions for the Afterlife for builders.

hook.text: Your heart is weighed against a feather. If it's heavy with sin, a monster devours it. Egypt's afterlife had rules.

buildup.text: The Book of the Dead was a collection of spells placed in tombs to guide the deceased through the underworld.

discovery.text: Each copy was customized for the dead person. It was personalized spiritual technology, not a universal scripture.

twist.text: Rich Egyptians got longer scrolls with more spells. Even the afterlife had a class system. Money bought protection.

climax.text: Egypt's funeral texts show that humans have always tried to control death with words. We still write eulogies today.

punchline.text: Egypt's dead carried cheat sheets to the afterlife. Words fight death.

quiz.question: What was the Egyptian Book of the Dead?
options: A collection of spells to guide the dead through the afterlife
